description: Identify which winery had the highest turnover in 2017.

Rank the wineries from highest to lowest turnover in 2017.
Find the winery with the lowest turnover in 2017.

What percentage of the wineries have a turnover greater than 300 million euros?
Is there a noticeable correlation between the winery names and their turnover values in 2017?
